      • JensenShannonDivergence

        public static double JensenShannonDivergence(double[] P,
                             double[] Q)
        Implementation of the Jensen-Shannon divergence test, which measures the similarity between two probability distributions. Based on the Kullback- Leibler divergence.
        Returns:
        total divergence to the average
        See Also:
        KullbackLeiblerDivergence, Jensen–Shannon divergence
